name: Minimal Match 3 Ultimate
description:
How to play
  • Match 3 items in a row
  • Each level has a goal under 'Target' 
  • 100 Levels to solve
  • Map screen click and drag

Designed in MacPaint for the original 1984 Macintosh, this match 3 casual game merges old and new Apple technology to re-invent a popular game.

Specially designed in 8-bit low-fi black and white graphics the game uses a mix of vector graphics and 1980's MacPaint repeating patterns to create a completely new contemporary style, all for the love of Mac.

“All the computer games I grew up with had this stark black and white style. Minimal Match 3 Ultimate brings back fond memories of games built on limited systems, yet they blew my mind.” - The Appreciative Minimalist

Also available on iPhone, iPad and Android
